CU RTZA GNYIS PA'O,, ,,BCOM LDAN 'DAS MA 'PHAGS PA SHES RAB KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA BRGYAD STONG PA RDZOGS SO,, ,,RGYA GAR GYI MKHAN SH'AKYA SE NA DANG DZNY'A NA SIDDHI DANG ZHU CHEN GYI LO TZTSA BA BAN DE DHARMA T'A SH'I LA LA SOGS PAS BSGYUR CING ZHUS TE GTAN LA PHAB, ,SLAD KYIS DBANG PHYUG DAM PA'I MNGA' BDAG BOD KYI DPAL LHA BTZAN PO BKRA SHIS LHA SDE BTZAN GYIS BKAS, RGYA GAR GYI MKHAN PO SU BH'A shI TA DANG, SGRA BSGYUR GYI LO TZTSA BA DGE SLONG RIN CHEN BZANG POS 'GREL PA DANG MTHUN PAR BSGYUR, SLAD KYIS RGYA GAR GYI MKHAN PA PAndI TA CHEN PO D'I BAm GA RA SHR'I DZNY'A NA DANG, ZHU CHEN GYI LO TZTSA BA DGE SLONG RIN CHEN BZANG POS YUL DBUS KYI 'GREL PA LA GTUGS NAS BCOS SHING ZHUS TE GTAN LA PHAB, YANG SLAD KYIS KYI SMAD GNYE THANG NA MO CHER, PAndI TA CHEN PO D'I BAm KA RA SHR'I DZNY'A NA DANG, LO TZTSA BA 'BROM RGYAL BA'I 'BYUNG GNAS GNYIS KYIS BRGYAD STONG PA BSHAD PA'I DUS SU CHE LONG ZHIG GTAN LA PHAB, PHYIS RA SGRENG GI GTZUG LAG KHANG DU LO TZTSA BA 'BROM RGYAL BA'I 'BYUNG GNAS KYIS RGYA GAR GYI MDO @505B GSUM GTUGS NAS LAN GNYIS GTAN LA PHAB, ,SLAD KYIS YANG LO TZTSA BA DE NYID KYIS BSHAD PA MDZAD CING PHRAN TSEGS KYANG GTAN LA PHAB, DUS PHYIS LO TZTSA BA CHEN PO SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BLO LDAN SHES RAB KYIS KHA CHE'I DPE DANG YUL DBUS KYI DPE DU MA BSAGS NAS GTAN LA PHAB, ,SLAR YANG SNYIGS DUS KYI THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA PO, ZHUL LO TZTSA BA DPAL RIN CHEN CHOS SKYONG BZANG PO'I ZHAL SNGA NAS KYIS, RGYA BOD KYI DPE DU MA DAR BSTUN NAS SHIN TU RNAM PAR DAG PAR MDZAD PA'I MA PHYI DANG, RGYA DPE GNYIS DANG, RGYA DPE GNYIS DANG, BOD DPE BAR MA RNAMS LA GTUGS TE,
